column1: The Purple Pig////Dishes were huge for tapas. We ordered the broccoli
column4: and the bone marrow. The broccoli had a nice grilled flavor and the anchovy sauce reminded me of Cesar salad dressing. The pistachio butter on the roasted beets was amazing
column5: but the goat cheese foam kind of overpowered the entire dish for us. The half duck was good
column6: not amazing. For all the rave on yelp about the bone marrow
column7: it just didn't deliver. It was not charred on the surface (kind of looked boiled?) and it lacked creativity as a dish overall.
